articles.description: Ashwin achieved the feat on Day 3 of the pink-ball Test against Sri Lanka in Bengaluru where he had finished with 4 for 55 | Cricket
articles.content: Veteran Indian off-spinner Ravichandran Ashwin on Monday hit a sensational hundred, not with the bat though, to become the first cricketer ever to achieve an incredible feat in Test cricket. Ashwin a… [+1884 chars]

articles.title: ‘He’s got attractive shots, is a good-looking man and has it all’: Gavaskar names ‘the next big thing’ in Indian cricket - Hindustan Times
articles.description: With India not playing a Test match until after the T20 World Cup in October it is time to take a look at the future and Gavaskar picked the “next big thing” in Indian cricket. | Cricket
articles.content: Team India completed yet another series whitewash, a fifth consecutive at home under the new all-format leader Rohit Sharma. India won by 238 runs on Monday to beat Sri Lanka in the pink-ball Test in… [+1586 chars]
